sentence.Network_en: Pain and ecchymosis were the common presentations in all 7 cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 疼痛及皮肤青紫改变是所有患者的常见症状.

sentence.Network_en: On physical exam, she has multiple facial abrasions, periorbital ecchymosis, symmetrical breath a slightly distended abdomen.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek ekkhumōsis 'escape of blood', from ekkhumonathai 'force out blood'

means.word_mean: 1. the purple or black-and-blue area resulting from a bruise
2. the escape of blood from ruptured blood vessels into the surrounding tissue to form a purple or black-and-blue spot on the skin
